message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's important to reach a deal quickly because the value decreases over time.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the value of the money is decreasing. Let's agree on this before we lose more!
Bob, I understand the time pressure, but your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  This is my counter-offer. Let's be reasonable and settle this now.
